name: InsituModbus
keywords: Insitu,In-situ, Modbus, communication, bus, sensor, water level, pressure
description: Arduino library for communication with Insitu pressure and water level sensors via Modbus.

dependencies.name: SensorModbusMasterNh
dependencies.note: EnviroDIY SensorModbusMaster - Arduino library for communicating via modbus with the Arduino acting as the modbus master.
